item.description:
THIS EVENT IS RUN BY RI VOTER COALITION
AND THIS IS THE SECOND EVENT...LET'S MAKE THIS TURNOUT BETTER THAN THE LAST ONE!
THERE IS PLENTY OF ROOM FOR ALL!

MEET THE CANDIDATES
Thursday, November 19, 2009, 7pm
FEATURING CANDIDATES FOR
US House of Representatives (District 2)
Elizabeth Dennigan
Mark Zaccaria
Michael Gardiner
RI Attorney General: Erik Wallin
RI Representative for District 36: Michael Connely
RI Senate District 22: David Bibeault

LOCATION: Westerly Elks
1 Dixon Street
Westerly, RI 02891
TIME: 7pm to 9pm
DATE: November 19, 2009
(Doors open at 6:30 pm)
For more information go to http://rhodeislandvot...
item.name: RHODE ISLAND VOTER COALITION THE FORUM WHERE THE VOTERS ASK THE QUESTIONS!
